translation.title: Pokémon GO Type Effectiveness Tool
translation.tool1_description: Select the defending Pokémon's type(s) to see recommended attack types and types to avoid.
translation.no_super_effective: No attack types deal super-effective damage.
translation.no_less_effective: No attack types deal less than normal damage.
translation.tool2_description: Select an attacking type to see recommended defending types and types to avoid.
translation.no_resistances: No defending types resist this attack type.
translation.no_weaknesses: No defending types take super-effective damage.
